name: contact-keeper.png
description: A full-stack project developed with Mongo DB, Node.JS, and React application for saving accounts in the database for logged in users, allow to update/delete/add contact and to register. Also used state management with Context API, functional components, and JWT authentications.

name: supermarket.png
description: Register, login and select some products and then order them while filling the appropriate data. There is an admin user who can add/delete/update products and see all of the users orders.

name: vacationsApp.png
description: Sign up, login and search for a vacation deal You can add the one's you like to follows list The admin user can add/delete/update a vacation The changes will effect automaticlly on the website with Socket.io

name: cryptoCoins.png
description: Giving information and current-time data about the Cryptography market, you can search the coins in the search field, see their information and select up to 5 coins Watch the coins you picked on a chart with real-time price.

name: it-logger.png
description: React app to track IT department tasks and issues. Uses JSON-Server as a mock backend.

name: github-finder.png
description: An app for finding users in Github. developed in React.js, used API calls, axios, functional components and state management with context.

name: myTaskBoard.png
description: Write your daily tasks, save them on your machine and delete the tasks you finished.

name: cocktailsbook.png
description: An app developed in Angular with API calls, Bootstrap, and Rxjs displaying recipies for cocktails.
